City Council
============

Physical Address:

7286 Dietz Elkhorn  
Fair Oaks Ranch, TX 78015

Phone:

[(210) 698-0900](tel:2106980900)

Fax:

(210) 698-3565

[Email](mailto:cityhall@fairoaksranchtx.org)
